com.eis.greenenergy.connection

Class TwitterUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.eis.greenenergy.connection.TwitterUpdate

  • public class TwitterUpdate
extends
    Class which defines an AsyncTask for connecting to the Twitter Api.
    By connecting to the Twitter Api, sending tweets about the user's score is enabled and covered in
    this AsyncTask.
    Since:
    2014-05-30
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Veronika Henk, Sarvenaz Golchin, Mahnaz Hajibaba

    • Constructor Detail

      • TwitterUpdate

        public TwitterUpdate(Context context,
             java.lang.String consumerKey,
             java.lang.String consumerSecret,
             java.lang.String oauthToken,
             java.lang.String oauthSecret)
        The context of the calling activity is assigned to the class variable context.
        The class variables TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY, TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET, PREF_KEY_OAUTH_TOKEN, and PREF_KEY_OAUTH_SECRET are initialized with constant values from the class UserManager. Moreover the constructor assigns a SharedPreferences instance of the activity.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the activity calling the Async-Task TwitterUpdate.
        consumerKey - Constant variable which is part of the Twitter Api key and necessary to send a request.
        consumerSecret - Constant variable which is part of the Twitter Api key and necessary to send a request.
        oauthToken - Constant variable which is part of the Twitter Api key and necessary to send a request.
        oauthSecret - Constant variable which is part of the Twitter Api key and necessary to send a request.

    • Method Detail

      • onPreExecute

        protected void onPreExecute()
        Defines what needs to be done before the network connection is established.
        A progress dialog is created and displayed as an indication to the user to wait until the network request is completed.

      • doInBackground

        protected java.lang.String doInBackground(java.lang.String... args)
        A connection to the Twitter Api is established in order to tweet the user's score.
        Moreover the constants containing the Twitter Api key are used to build a connection and the SharedPreferences instance is used to access the user's Twitter account. The new status is posted using the Twitter Api.
        Parameters:
        args[0] - Text of the tweet which should be posted on Twitter as status update
        Returns:
        null if the status update was successful;
        -1 otherwise.

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(java.lang.String file_url)
        Defines what needs to be done after the network connection is closed.
        The progress dialog, which was created earlier, is dismissed.
        Parameters:
        file_url - Result of the operation conducted in the doInBackground() method.
